Articles.Content:
I was goofing around with the Mystery goo canister, and had it open. When I zoomed in on one of the hole, though, I saw A smiley face!!! You could only see it if it was zoomed in at max, and was very faint. Pretty neat, though!

Here's a photo: file:///Users/gusdupree/Downloads/KSP/Screenshots/EasterEgg!.png (The face is in the middle row of holes, second to the left)
Use a site like imageshack or imgur to upload your photos and then link them here.
Here's the picture on Imgur! http://imgur.com/g4f9Ykb
Oh yeah so there is, nice find.
I couldn't see a darn thing... so I adjusted some brightness and contrast settings...
You really should use a simple host like Postimage.org. Much easier to use than Imgur.
Holy hell! A new Easter Egg! Someone add this to the wiki!

Imagine if that smiley face actually was the goo all along.

So tiny for such a canister, but given how it was made by Kerbals it's not a big surprise.
Gustomundo, if you copy-paste the BBCode link from Imgur, your image will display without you needing to add any code to it.
I added it to the wiki on the easter eggs page. Credit was given for the original image and the altered version, which did end up on the page.

Hmm, there's a similar smiley face on the seafloor south of KSC...

We appear to have a mystery on our hands...

So the mystery goo is a living organism.....and you lot have been exposing it to all kinds of horrific environments!

Shame on you.
So, does that mean you get a sweet black dot from the ribbon generator?

Hmm, there's a similar smiley face on the seafloor south of KSC...

Old.

Perhaps its a large colony of goo?

Captain Sierra, there seem to be more easter eggs on the new lab module, too. Have a look at this thread, if you haven't already:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65672-Just-found-this-cool-easter-egg

There's more info in the comments below the first post. I don't know, maybe you could find the time to add it in the wiki section, or tell someone to do so. Just letting you know, in case you weren't aware of it =)
Quick, someone expose the mystery goo over the smily face!
